acceptOperatorChange(bytes).details: Only the new operator can accept the change.Reverts if the queue delay has not passed.

cancelOperatorChange(bytes).details: Only the current operator can cancel the change.

deposit(bytes,bytes,bytes,address).details: emits the Deposit event upon successful deposit.Reverts if the operator is already set and caller passed non-zero operator.

params.credentials: is the withdrawal credentials of the validator.
params.operator: is the address of the operator used for `POL` mechanics.
params.pubkey: is the consensus public key of the validator.
params.signature: is the signature used only on the first deposit.

getOperator(bytes).details: Returns zero address if the pubkey is not registered.

returns._0: The operator address for the given pubkey.

requestOperatorChange(bytes,address).details: Only the current operator can request a change.

acceptOperatorChange(bytes).notice: Accept the operator change of a validator.

cancelOperatorChange(bytes).notice: Cancel the operator change of a validator.

deposit(bytes,bytes,bytes,address).notice: Submit a deposit message to the Beaconchain.This will be used to create a new validator or to top up an existing one, increasing stake.

getOperator(bytes).notice: Get the operator address for a given pubkey.

requestOperatorChange(bytes,address).notice: Request to change the operator of a validator.
